/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and urban architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the dynamic cityscape. The image is captured from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
